description: Contributed to the development of PlayFuty, a Fantasy Sports Telegram Mini App, along with its CMS and Website.
Developed interactive fantasy games using TypeScript, React.js, and Tailwind CSS. Along with Redux and React Query for efficient data fetching and caching.
Implemented animation effects across all CTAs using Framer Motion, along with a custom-built audio manager to provide audio and haptic feedback.
Improved overall app performance through memoization, virtualization, fuzzy searching, and hashmaps, ensuring smooth user interactions.
Contributed in building Loan Origination System & its CMS using Java, Spring Boot & MongoDB from inception stage to DEV & UAT environments.
Developed optimised Restful APIs for LOS & CMS systems with minimal response time using MongoDB aggregation pipelines.
Optimised MongoDB schema and aligned with evolving software requirements, ensuring data consistency and compatibility.
Configured CronJobs functions for on-time notifications in both LOS & CMS systems & configured Spring Security for LOS Applications for safe and secured user authentication & authorization.
